```bash
.github/
├── workflows/            # GitHub Actions CI/CD pipelines
│   ├── build.yml
│   ├── release.yml
│   └── docs-deploy.yml
├── ISSUE_TEMPLATE/       # Templates for new issues
│   ├── bug_report.md
│   └── feature_request.md
├── PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE.md  # PR template
├── CODEOWNERS            # Defines maintainers for directories
├── dependabot.yml        # Dependency update configuration
└── FUNDING.yml           # Sponsor links for GitHub profile
```
